languages.text: Мир Райкад Минорис и его губернатор желают почтить Лорд-капитана древней церемонией — триумфом победителя.
The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.
languages.original_text: Мир Райкад Минорис и его губернатор желают почтить Лорд-капитана древней церемонией — триумфом победителя.

traits.locale_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.
The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.
The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

languages.text: Die Welt Rykad Minoris und ihr Gouverneur wollen den Lord Captain mit einer alten Zeremonie ehren – dem Triumph.
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: Die Welt Rykad Minoris und ihr Gouverneur wollen den Lord Captain mit einer alten Zeremonie ehren – dem Triumph.

languages.text: Le monde de Rykad Minoris et son gouverneur souhaitent rendre hommage {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} au moyen d'une cérémonie antique, le Triomphe.
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: Le monde de Rykad Minoris et son gouverneur souhaitent rendre hommage {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} au moyen d'une cérémonie antique, le Triomphe.

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスの惑星とその総督は、古代の儀式である「凱旋」でロード・キャプテンを称えたいと思っている。
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスの惑星とその総督は、古代の儀式である「凱旋」でロード・キャプテンを称えたいと思っている。

languages.text: El mundo de Rykad Minoris y su gobernador quieren honrar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con una ceremonia antigua: el Triunfo.
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: El mundo de Rykad Minoris y su gobernador quieren honrar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con una ceremonia antigua: el Triunfo.

languages.text: 小莱卡德的总督希望能举办传统的庆典仪式“凯旋巡礼”，以此庆祝领主舰长的光辉胜利。
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: 小莱卡德的总督希望能举办传统的庆典仪式“凯旋巡礼”，以此庆祝领主舰长的光辉胜利。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris dünyası ve valisi, Lord Kaptan'ı kadim bir merasim olan Zafer Alayı ile şereflendirmek istiyor.
languages.original_text: The world of Rykad Minoris and its governor want to honour the Lord Captain with an ancient ceremony — the Triumph.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris dünyası ve valisi, Lord Kaptan'ı kadim bir merasim olan Zafer Alayı ile şereflendirmek istiyor.
